ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron barked into the comm unit, I want you, my darling, you alone! Not to worry.....Im not here to destroy you yet. This is a warning. Come one week from

    Megatron barked into the comm unit, "I want you, my darling, you alone! 
Not to worry.....Im not here to destroy you yet. This is a warning. Come one 
week from now I want to meet with you, alone, in private, now weapons or 
troops. I belive we can come to some sort of compremise. To make things 
better you can choose the location, be it out in the middle of the shavana, 
or inside your ship." He said, lowered his commlink, and signaled his forces 
to draw back, the seige was on a hiadias until Megatron got what he wanted.
    As quickly as they came, the Predacons headed out, the upper hand was 
theres, for now.

    Aracnia, Paralysis, Tankkor, and Rampage arrived to see Megatron 
withdraw. Kitkat was her allie now, and when she saw Meg's on the radar she 
rushed over.
    "Commander Kitkat, may I be of some aid to you?" Aracnia siad, looking at 
the base from afar.
